wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Tritton (1819–1887) was a British Quaker banker.

response: Joseph Herbert Tritton was born on 5 September 1844 at Olney Lodge, in Battersea, then in Surrey (now London).Jessie Campbell, Tritton, Joseph Herbert (1844-1923), banker, Oxford Index, September 2004 His father, Joseph Tritton (1819–1887), was a Quaker banker. His mother was Amelia Hanson, the daughter of Joseph Hanson of Brixton.
